Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Using just your voice to control your TV , you can play video and music, change channels, change volume, control smart homes devices, and more. Please just ask Alexa!

To start, please launch alexa app in your TV. After a while ,a serials of number will be shown on TV, you need to log in the website :https://amazon.com
/us/code ,and input the number . Through these steps, your TV will register to your account ,and try to use alexa app in your mobile phone to discover your TV device.

Try out these phrases((DeviceName) should be the name of your device);
As an example by the name of “TV”
(1)Change Input 
 Alexa ,change input to HDMI1(DTV, HDMI 2, HDMI 3,) on TV
(2)Change Channel (number)
 Alexa, change channel to 11 on TV
(4)Skip Channel
 Alexa, next channel on TV
 Alexa, channel up on TV
 Alexa, channel down on TV
(5)Adjust Volume
 Alexa, volume up (by 20) on TV
 Alexa, volume down (by 20) on TV
(6)Set Volume
 Alexa, set volume to 50 on TV
(7)Mute
 Alexa, mute on TV
 Alexa, unmute on TV
(8)Launch APP
 Alexa, launch Netflix(Netflix, YouTube, Prime Video) on TV
(9)Jump
 Alexa, go to home on TV
 Alexa, go to settings on TV
 Alexa, go to guide on TV
(12)Multimedia
 Alexa, play(play, pause, stop, fastforward,rewind) on TV
(13)Change Channel
Alexa,change channel to BBC(channel name)
(14)Youtube
 Alexa,play Justin Bieber on Youtube
 Alexa,search Babyshark on Youtube
